# 2.Tables Grade

use  ae_table_grade()

```{r}
ae_table_grade(df_ae=ae, df_enrol=enrolres, arm=NULL, variant="max") %>% 
  as_flextable(header_show_n=TRUE) %>% 
  add_footer_lines("Percentages reflect the proportion of patients whose maximum AE grade was as indicated.")
```
